invite.commissionFirstTimeOnlyDescription: When enabled, commission is generated only on the inviter's first payment; you can configure individual users in user management
invite.enableForcedInviteDescription: When enabled, only invited users can register
invite.inviteCommissionPercentageDescription: Default global commission distribution ratio; you can configure individual ratios in user management

register.ipRegistrationLimitDescription: When enabled, IPs that meet the rule requirements will be restricted from registering; note that IP determination may cause issues due to CDNs or frontend proxies
register.penaltyTimeDescription: Users must wait for the penalty time to expire before registering again
register.registrationLimitCountDescription: Enable penalty after reaching registration limit
register.stopNewUserRegistrationDescription: When enabled, no one can register
register.trialRegistrationDescription: Enable trial registration; modify trial package and duration first

verify.turnstileSecretDescription: Turnstile secret key provided by Cloudflare
verify.turnstileSiteKeyDescription: Turnstile site key provided by Cloudflare
